VS Code, Jupyter, Power BI

Experience
AutoPulse Aug. 2025 – Present
Full-Stack - AI Engineer (Full-time) Cairo, Egypt
– Co-built an internal CRM system covering customer onboarding, ticketing, and pipeline tracking.
– Designed and developed the public landing page end-to-end (information architecture, UI, deployment).
– Developing a chatbot and AI features for the mobile application to enable self-service and intelligent insights.
Cloud Engineer Intern Jul. 2025 – Sept. 2025
Mideast Communication Systems Cairo, Egypt

National Bank of Kuwait Cairo, Egypt

Research & Publications
Talent Vision AI: Data-Driven Football Scouting Framework Accepted, In Press

– Engineered an end-to-end data pipeline with web scraping and interactive dashboards featuring radar charts for actionable
insights
Projects
Wellness360 – Full-Stack Fitness Tracker Next.js, NestJS, MongoDB, Docker Jun. 2025
– Engineered a full-stack fitness platform (Next.js/NestJS) featuring a Gemini AI chatbot for personalized recommendations,
secured with Google OAuth, and deployed via a Dockerized CI/CD pipeline.
AWS Task Manager AWS CDK, Next.js, TypeScript May 2025
– Architected a serverless backend with AWS CDK; Integrated RDS, Lambda, API Gateway, S3, Cognito, and SQS
– Crafted a responsive Next.js frontend with secure authentication and scalable task management features
Sports AI Platform Python, FastAPI, React, Chart.js AI League Hackathon, Apr. 2025
– Implemented a FastAPI backend featuring clustering algorithms (DBSCAN, GMM, K-Means) for player performance analysis
– Designed React frontend with interactive visualizations for cross-league performance analytics
Semi-Supervised Heart Disease Prediction Python, Scikit-learn Mar. 2025
– Devised clustering algorithms for label inference; Trained ensemble models achieving 92% accuracy
– Conducted comprehensive EDA and feature engineering to maximize predictive performance
Olympics Data Visualization Power BI, DAX Dec. 2024
– Integrated Paris 2024 datasets; Created interactive dashboards with advanced DAX measures and slicers
Database Query Optimization PostgreSQL, pgAdmin Dec. 2024
– Enhanced 24 complex queries with strategic indexing, boosting performance by up to 40%
